services.name: Recipes
services.description: We have a wide variety of recipes from the chef's personal collection, allowing users to browse and search for specific dishes by cuisine, course, ingredient, or dietary restriction.

services.name: Cooking Classes
services.description: We can offer online cooking classes that users can take to learn new culinary skills, techniques, and recipes from the chef. The classes could be either pre-recorded or live, with the option for users to interact with the chef and ask questions in real-time.

services.name: Catering Services
services.description: The chef could offer catering services for private events such as weddings, parties, and corporate functions. We have catering menu, pricing information, and a booking system for clients to request the chef's services.

services.name: Meal Delivery
services.description: We are currently offering a meal delivery service where users can order pre-prepared meals that are delivered to their doorstep. The meals could be either pre-set or customizable, with options for different portion sizes, dietary restrictions, and meal plans.

services.name: Product Sales
services.description: Occasionally we arrange food fair where we sell a range of culinary products such as spices, sauces, cookbooks, or kitchen tools on our website. The products could be either branded or curated by the chef, with the option for users to purchase them directly from the website.

services.name: Blog and Newsletter
services.description: We have blog and newsletter services where the chef can share their culinary insights, tips, and experiences with their audience. The blog could also be a platform for the chef to showcase their latest recipes, events, and collaborations.
